name: Palette Piggy
description:
Oh no! This cute little piggy is trapped in a maze. Guide them to the exit of each level to win the game.

How to Play:

Keyboard:
Arrow Keys - Move
Spacebar - Switch maps

Gamepad:
Joystick - Move
A/X button - Switch maps

Keep note, you can't switch to a map when your piggy is standing on the darker coloured floor!

Developed in Love2D over the course of 72 hours for the Pre-Indie Game Jam.  This was our first time using the Love2D Game Engine.

Credits:

danbolt - Art, Programming

spicyroboto - Art, Programming

Kyle Miner (no itch page) - Programming, Level Design, Moral Support

Visager - Music (song is Roots [loop] from Songs from an Unmade World)
